Key Class Reference

#include <Key.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A key represents a physical key on the keyboard.

This abstracts from the underlying system. Key events and the key stroke field use this key object to point to a physical key. Concrete implementations should provide more information about the respective key.

See also:
KeyStrokeField
